title: LuciTree Tech
lbl-about-content-1: is a quality software outsourcing service provider based in Vietnam. Anything and everything related to mobile application and web development is our strength. Our leadership team has 10+ years working in software development and our skillful technical team has had strong experience in many large and complex projects.
lbl-why-choose-us-2: Luci Tree Tech We pride ourselves in apps for iOS & Android, as well as web development. We have worked with startups & enterprise companies in different fields and in different countries such as Australia, The United State, etc.
lbl-why-choose-us-3: Luci Tree Tech can help your business to reduce significant costs by using latest tools & technologies and consulting you the best solutions. We offer you a full range of services which are tailored to your specific business needs – from defining a long-term mobile strategy, to UI/UX, to engineering & testing, and even ongoing maintenance & operations.
lbl-why-choose-us-4: Our team of innovators, architects, designers, developers and testers share one mission: to help startups & enterprises create value and accelerate growth through technology. Happy customers and long-term relationships have always been one of our main goals.
lbl-why-choose-us-reason-5: Accompany your business by advising reasonable features.
lbl-why-choose-us-reason-8: Smooth process and good customer service.
lbl-why-choose-us-reason-10: Good technical architecture for scalable projects and stable growth.
lbl-service-content: LuciTree Tech provides you a full-circle development to help startups and enterprises build successful mobile apps and webs. Over the years, we have had the privilege of working on a range of projects which have given us a wealth of experience in the services we offer.
lbl-service-content-2: Luci Tree Tech builds apps which perform high quality, good UI/UX, usability and reliability. Our team is highly-skilled to bring the apps of any complexity to life. We will develop your idea into apps which are user-friendly, modern, stylish, elegant and useful among similar existing apps.
lbl-service-content-4: With over 10 years of experience, we have deployed many large-scale web based infrastructures as well as landing pages in a wide variety of industries. Our web-focused designers, UI/UX experts, technical architects and skillful developers will bring top-quality solutions to your products.
lbl-service-content-6: A successful digital product is not only great to look at, but also friendly and easy to use. We believe that the foundation for it is UI/UX, therefore, we invest time in user research and design to create beautiful and engaging experiences.
